Product title: Shower Soap Dispenser Wall Mounted No Drill Shampoo Dispenser for Shower Wall Shampoo and Conditioner Dispenser Bathroom Hotel 3 * 300ml Chrome with Labels
Key Features: 💧[No Damage of Wall] Shower shampoo dispenser 3 chamber support punching and adhesive accessories to meet different installation demands. Just take a few mintes to assemble and Installation Instructions available on this page. | 💧[No Frequently Replenish] Bathroom shower dispensers with capacity hold 3*300ml liquid. A great solution to solve Frequently replenish hassle. Transparent chamber assist you check soap clearly and add that in time. Caps and bottles can be removed from wall to cleaning and refilling. | 💧[Easy to distinguish] Shampoo shower dispenser made of durable ABS and conbined with gungray shell, enverimental-friendly and high-quality, strong and wear resistant. Come with waterproof labels of shampoo, conditioner and shower gel to easily distinguish. | 💧[Smooth Outlet] Wall shampoo dispenser equipped with upgraded nozzle No drips, No leakage, No plugging. Round push button can be pressed more than 500000+ times. | 💧[Widely Use] Perfect for commercial bathroom, hotel, gym, club can avoids pilferage. Locks design also make lovely child stop playing soap. Work well with soap, shampoo, body wash, most of thick conditioner.
comment 1: This item works to perfection 👌 easy to install and looks great in my shower 🚿...I found some bodywash on Amazon by the gallon that I use in the dispenser. I save money by not having to buy bodywash so often... A must have for your shower. - DARREN REINHARDT
comment 2: These are very easy to install and perfect for rentals. I like that you can see how much is left which makes it easy to refill as needed. The stickers are very good quality and easy to attach. - Kindle Customer
comment 3: Great concept, but locking function is really not "lockable".  Bought it for my Airbnb.  Still very nice though and very easy to hang and label.  I'd still recommend if you aren't concerned with the lock function. - Amanda Jok
comment 4: This is so perfect for my shower.  It sticks to the tiles so tight and so convinces for my shampoo, conditioner and body wash no more miss in ny shower.  I will definitely buy again. 5 🌟 and 2 thumbs 👍🏽 - Lindra
comment 5: Slightly smaller than expected, but they hold together well. They come with an adhesive pad that screws to the back, and mounting screws depending on which way you would prefer to attach it. I just stuck the adhesive pad on the wall and screwed the bracket to the pad. It seems to hold great! - Nick singleton
